page.title: 20Domesday Affwinnin on Papa.
page.content:
On Thursday 27th.ofJune 1985 we wrote up our last page of text for the B.B.C. Domesday Project.We celebrated it's completion (Shet._to have an{ {affwinnin})by having a barbecue. Almost everyone on the island has helped us with information and some folk deserve a special THANK YOU. Our thanks go to Alex Scott,Walter Scott(Scalloway),Jill and Joyce from the S.F.S.G.,the boys at the Lerwick Observatory and Fred (our micro). Authors of text are as follows:- {Luke Holtbrook }( age 8yrs.)- pages 7 and 18. { {Thor Holtbrook}(age 11 yrs.)_ pages 2,4,6,8,9,11,13,14 and 15 _ Phew! {Morrigan Milliken}(age 7yrs.)page 3. {Naomi Jane Scott }(age 8yrs)pages 5,12 and 17.The Holidays start today,Goody!
Editor and accomplice _ Yvonne Buggy.
